author: Brittany Valadez For Dailymail.Com
title: Mariah Carey returns from trip to Dubai in full glam | Daily Mail Online
text: She jetted to the Middle East with her new boyfriend and children last weekend. And on Saturday, Mariah Carey returned to LAX with her travelling companions in tow. The singer was in town as part of the Dubai Jazz Festival. They're back! On Saturday, Mariah Carey, 46, returned to LAX with five-year-old twins Moroccan and Monroe Cannon and boyfriend Bryan Tanaka, 33 Mariah dripped in diamonds as she exited the airport. The 46-year-old paired her jewellery items with a Latin-inspired, off-the-shoulder frock. While she was styled for an evening out, the mum-of-two dressed twins Moroccan and Monroe Cannon, five, in tracksuits and trainers. Boyfriend Bryan, 33, was trendy in a leather jacket and T-shirt combination. A long trip: She first jetted to the Middle East with her toyboy and children last weekend Work trip: The singer was in town as part of the Dubai Jazz Festival Glamorous: Mariah dripped in diamonds as she exited the airport Earlier that day, Mariah Carey shared a couple's selfie on Instagram with her boyfriend of around four months. 'Festive moments on the tallest building in the world! ❤️ #Dubai #Lambily' wrote the singer. In the photo, Mariah, clad in full glam, leaned into her choreographer love. The couple were each wearing white, with Mariah choosing a leather jacket and Bryan, a solid T-shirt. 'Festive moments on the tallets building in the world!' Mariah posted a sweet snap from her trip Dressing to impress: The Mariah's World star paired her jewellery items with a Latin-inspired, off-the-shoulder frock Keeping them comfortable! While she was styled for an evening out, the mum-of-two dressed her twins in tracksuits and trainers Around Thanksgiving of last year, the duo were spotted kissing in Hawaii, after speculation arose that the two were dating following a broken engagement. In an interview with Rolling Stone , the We Belong Together songstress discussed, only slightly, her relationship with her much-younger beau. 'I don't think we're being public in a way that my relationships have been public before,' she began. ''I really don't. To me, the best thing of this is to keep it a little more private. But I'm not going to not go places with him and enjoy our lives because everybody thinks, 'Oh, it's too soon!' kind of thing. We all saw the freakin' show. This is not a surprise.' Dapper: Boyfriend Bryan was trendy in a leather jacket and T-shirt combination Their beginning: Around Thanksgiving of last year, the duo were spotted kissing in Hawaii, after speculation arose that the two were dating following a broken engagement Mariah was previously set to wed Australian billionaire James Packer. The former couple officially ended things in September 2016, having first connected at the Hercules premiere in 2014. She was also married to Nick Cannon from April 2008 to 2016. She was also wed to music mogul Tommy Mottola from June 1993 until his marriage to Thalia.
